headline: Will Margin Performance Aid Huntington Ingalls' Q3 Earnings?
summary: HII's Q3 results are likely to reflect solid sales across the majority of its business segments and the benefits of margin improvement in its shipbuilding business.

headline: HII’s Mission Technologies Division Announces New Operating Model for Long-Term Business Growth
summary: MCLEAN, Va., Oct. 25, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced that its Mission Technologies division will consolidate its six operational groups into four. The changes are designed to optimize the division for continued long-term growth. Effective Monday, Oct. 28, the division will reorganize into the following groups: All-Domain Operations, led by Todd Gentry, comprises C5ISR operations; platforms and logistics support; and intelligence analysis.Global Security, led by Michael Lempke
